Love this dress. Colors are vibrant and style is elegant. This is very thin but not see through due to the color. It feels like one of those dresses you’d get from a boutique where it’s cute but the quality doesn’t necessarily match the price. The inside of the dress is white so that’s usually a sign of the quality. I wore this to dinner in Mexico and looked great. I would still recommend just take care when washing.

Love this dress for sunset dinner walk in Hawaii
Beautiful and flowing. Didn't fit my boobs great but they are super huge. I'm a 40G so did an ok job. So many compliments on it. I love it.

I ordered the blue paisley in an XS (I’m a size 0-2) and it is beautiful and comfortable!!! The only reason I’m returning is because I’m a DD and there is not enough coverage and way too much side boob. I’m so sad because I love this dress!
I was worried the dress may be too small but it fit perfectly and the material is nice.
I love this dress

评论概述: Not for the blessed in the chest ladies
评论详情: I’m a 38DD and feel like the straps are going to break.. serious side boob going on. The straps are just at a super weird angle in general. So cute and pretty in every other way. Stretchy waistband so could work as a maternity dress too.
Dress is comfortable & cute. Material feels a little cheap for the price. Needs pockets & I would order a size down.
Love this dress! 5’3 130 and I ordered a small.
This dress was lovely for a dinner out! The way it is made-I tied it tight enough that I didn’t need to wear a bra! I ordered a medium -the bottom is very comfortable with the elastic!

评论概述: So disappointing cause it was almost perfect
评论详情: The top portion has a seam that cuts right across the boob/nipple, which smushes your boob down across the center causing two separate boob bulges above and below the nipple. The spaghetti straps fall at a weird spot too making them uncomfortable on your shoulders and causing them to fall off easily. I’m a 36DD so maybe this would fit better on a smaller chest (although I can’t imagine the seam fitting right on anyone with nipples).  I’m 5’1” and the length was surprisingly perfect for me.  Super sad because the print and colors are gorgeous. Material is thin in a good way and doesn’t seem to be see through (although I only tried it on inside). I was so excited about this dress so I’m super bummed about the awkward design and fit.
I wanted to love this dress, but it just doesn’t look good on.
Love love this dress! Wore this to Hawaii and got so many compliments!

The material and length were great! But the bust just did not fit (36C). If I went up a size I don’t think the back would fit (it would be too lose even with the elastic), but at this size I just could not fit my boobs into the top and it was visibly tight in flattening way.

Overall it’s a nice dress. Only issue for me is the odd strap placement. My shoulders are on the broader side and it just looks like they should have made it a halter. Good length - maybe just below ankles and I’m 5’7”. Colors seem close to product images, and it’s reasonably well made. But the top just looks odd on me so it’s a no.
This dress was cute but very ill fitted on me. The fabric is thin enough for summer but also lacks structure which made it appear sloppy. Returned
Nice material. Just not a good fit for large breasted ladies
The elastic came undone around waist causing it to be unwearable as I was getting ready to wear it the first time. Looked cute on and really wish I could have worn it but it’s Cheaply made.

The spacing/area for your breasts isn’t very big and the design includes distinct stitching under the breasts that makes it an awkward fit. I am a 36DD and my not so perky breasts don’t fit quite right. There is a lot of side boob. I am still trying to see if I can adjust it enough to work for me because I do love the dress otherwise.

I love the fabric and print. The fit is for smaller chests.

评论概述: Super cute, a little long, elastic back - can't wear a bra
评论详情: This dress is super cute. I'm a full C and you can't wear a bra with it so it's not for me. I'm also 5'4 and i could JUUUST get away w wearing flip flops. If you're shorter than me, it will be too long, if you're taller than probably 5'8" i think it'll be too short. Other than that, its really nice material and super cute. I like that the back is elastic so you can just pull it under your butt to go to the bathroom.
Pretty dress but thin material with no lining.

This dress is extremely nice. The colors are so bright and fun and will be a perfect summer dress. The material is lightweight enough that I'm not worried about sweating too much but it's heavy enough that it isn't sheer or see-through. It's a flattering cut as well with a good waist definition. It's a bit long on me but would look great with a bit of heel.

评论概述: Fashion Forward and Flattering, runs slightly large
评论详情: This dress arrived carefully folded and came out of the package without a wrinkle. The colors are vivid and stunning and the fabric is silky and soft with an airiness that moves beautifully with your body. The straps are adjustable and the back tie means this dress can be adjusted to fit well in the top no matter what your shape. This does run a little large in the waist area and I will need to take mine in. I went with the measurement chart and the recommended size (medium) and the elasticized back is too loose for me (I am 5'4", 140 lbs) I could have ordered a small and had this fit a bit better.  This dress is beachy and beautiful and would be wonderful on a trip or cruise. If you are fairly short as I am you will need a bit of a heel as this dress does run long even as a maxi (which is fine with me since I live in heels) This comfortable, stylish dress will be cool in warm temperatures and would travel well, it is lightweight and wrinkle resistant. It also comes in a wide variety of colors and prints.  This dress does not have much stretch, but doesn't really need it because the top is adjustable and the waist has elastic. The fabric, while being silky and cool is not at all sheer or see through. This sundress is really beautiful and will become a favorite go to for summer!

This dress is pure magic! The length, the pattern, and that color - simply dazzling! As a proud member of the big-chested club, I can't believe I can strut around in this dress without a bra and still rock it like a superstar!

Dress fits well and has adjustable straps that help with fit. I received a lot of compliments. Beautiful dress. I’m 5’8 so I can wear flats without the dress hitting the ground. Anyone shorter may need a heel.
Great fit, quality, pattern. Can’t wait to wear it on the beach!

I had my eye on this dress.  The blue color with the red pattern caught my eye.  I finally ordered it for an upcoming vacation and I'm so glad I did.  It is super flattering and VERY comfortable.  The material isn't heavy so I know it won't be something I'll get hot in.  The open back adds  just enough drama to the dress.  I highly recommend.
I'm 5' 6" 137# AA. I bought a small and it fits really well and is very comfortable. I feel like it is more blue/red than the picture shows but that is okay.

Beautiful dress, great fit, flowy, comfortable...but it was sewn incorrectly. I love this dress and I'm so sad that it's defective. One of the straps was accidentally sewn threw the twisted part in the front. You can't put the strap over your shoulder. You also can't just untwist the front to free the strap. I'd have to unstitch it and re-sew it.  I've ordered another one, arriving tomorrow. Praying so much that it's right so that I can take it with me.
Comfy, cute and a bit of sexy. The material quality is meh. There was some fraying after 1 wear due to sitting in a rattan chair. But overall did the trick!
Sehr schönes Kleid, sehr angenehm.

Nice pattern and cotton material but very billowy so didn’t look right on me.

I fell twice and had a difficult time standing up because there was soooo much skirt.  That being said. I simply hemmed the dress (to above my knees). I still continue to wear it. And yes, I still really really like it.

So flattering in style and length. The material is interesting similar to a bathing suit or rash guard but thicker and not as stretchy. Hard to explain the material but perfect for a vacation or summer months.

Great quality, vibrant print (just as pictured), and nicely fitted. I’m 5”4” and 125 lbs with an A cup and XS fits perfectly. Great material loved the length
